#1 String: I think science fiction is an amazing genre for anything. Future science, technology, time travel, FTL travel, they're all such interesting concepts.
#2 String: I'm a huge fan of science fiction myself!

#1 String: I'm a huge fan of science fiction myself!
#2 String: Awesome! I really love how sci-fi storytellers focus on political/social/philosophical issues that would still be around even in the future. Makes them relatable.

#2 String: I agree. One of my favorite forms of science fiction is anything related to time travel! I find it fascinating.

#2 String: It's not quite sci-fi, but my favorite version of time travel is in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban. Breaks zero logical rules.
